call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Weekly Update & AMA - February 12th

decisions.decision: Moved the AMA to Wednesday because the AV person is traveling Thursday
decisions.speaker: Dan Friedman
decisions.context: Scheduling conflict with regular AV support
decisions.quote: we decided to move this a little earlier

commitments.commitment: Guard code coming soon, will be applied to guards and followed by watcher update
commitments.quote: We should see the guard code coming soon. We'll apply that to the guards. Make sure that's all hunky-dory and then you should see a watcher update there as well
we're planning to do for probably later this month

commitments.commitment: Will load Sam up with Ergo stickers for Hong Kong conference
commitments.quote: I'll make sure I'll load them up with Ergo stickers so they can be represented over there

open_questions.question: Will RSPalm be listed on a CEX at launch
open_questions.context: Community question about centralized exchange listing

open_questions.question: Best way to present ideas while protecting IP in Ergo ecosystem
open_questions.context: New community member asking about intellectual property protection

reversals_or_updates.update: Migrated to different PostgreSQL repository for Docker setup
reversals_or_updates.speaker: Dan Friedman

key_facts.fact: Testnet last 32 blocks were 16.77 seconds each with kushti's 6.0 RC2 jar update
key_facts.speaker: Dan Friedman

key_facts.fact: Sam and kushti will be doing combined Palmyra Ergo work at Hong Kong conference talking to potential funds and exchanges
key_facts.speaker: Dan Friedman
